short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google drive's shareable links of image files are not useable in html. This extension generates URLs to use in HTML img src

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you have some images on google drive and you want to link the images to your website or in the <img/> element of your HTML you need the image links. But the regular shareable link of the file from google drive doesn't work in that case. So this extension will generate image URLs for you to use in HTML.

Benefits:
* You can use google Drive images on your website.
* Host images on google drive
* Customize the image size.

Changelog:
## v1.0.1
- Added option to copy link for original image size
